other_tests.findings: Multiple foci of uptake in the ribs, particularly on the left
other_tests.changes_over_time: CT scans 35 days later showed healing fractures with callus formation; 10 months later, new lumbar vertebral and sacral fractures were observed with only faint uptake in the previous rib fractures

other_tests.findings: Low-grade diffuse uptake in the left upper lobe consistent with inflammation and uptake in several ribs bilaterally
other_tests.changes_over_time: CT scan confirmed the presence of healing fractures with callus formation in a left rib posterolaterally

other_tests.findings: Normal findings on FDG-PET scan 8 weeks after the fall
other_tests.changes_over_time: No evidence of cancer over 3 years of follow-up

other_tests.findings: Metabolically active pulmonary nodule and low-grade activity in two foci in the lower left lateral chest wall corresponding to rib fractures
